description:
Reaping souls of the dead and punching a clock might get monotonous but it's honest work for a Crow.
The job gets lively when your assigned soul is stolen and you must track down a desperate thief to a realm
untouched by death - where creatures grow far past their expiry.

v0.1.0.description:
First release of the Death's Door apworld! Very much an alpha version, you may experience bugs, please report them!

## What's Changed
* Minor cleanup by @ScipioWright in https://github.com/roseasromeo/DeathsDoorAPWorld/pull/1
* Fix activate furnance burner rule by @roseasromeo in https://github.com/roseasromeo/DeathsDoorAPWorld/pull/2
* Refactor entrances into their own files by @roseasromeo in https://github.com/roseasromeo/DeathsDoorAPWorld/pull/3
* Jefferson Logic, Item and Location Names, and many other fixes by @roseasromeo in https://github.com/roseasromeo/DeathsDoorAPWorld/pull/4
* Bring in a variety of small logic fixes by @roseasromeo in https://github.com/roseasromeo/DeathsDoorAPWorld/pull/5
* Fix Night and Day Events by moving to Hall of Doors Lobby region by @roseasromeo in https://github.com/roseasromeo/DeathsDoorAPWorld/pull/6
* Rename locations and items to improve clarity by @roseasromeo in https://github.com/roseasromeo/DeathsDoorAPWorld/pull/7
* Change lighting Lord lamps to events (and clean up many event names) by @roseasromeo in https://github.com/roseasromeo/DeathsDoorAPWorld/pull/8
* Fix missing exit on Lockstone Rooftop entrance by @roseasromeo in https://github.com/roseasromeo/DeathsDoorAPWorld/pull/9
* Reduce generation failures by sorting life seeds in fill hook by @roseasromeo in https://github.com/roseasromeo/DeathsDoorAPWorld/pull/14
* Add fire as a requirement to use exits from Deadbolt and Opengate by @roseasromeo in https://github.com/roseasromeo/DeathsDoorAPWorld/pull/15
* Capture additional access route to fortress pre-main gate lever by @roseasromeo in https://github.com/roseasromeo/DeathsDoorAPWorld/pull/16
* Move modification of early/local_early to generate_early by @roseasromeo in https://github.com/roseasromeo/DeathsDoorAPWorld/pull/24
* Fix name of Stranded Sailor Caves location by @roseasromeo in https://github.com/roseasromeo/DeathsDoorAPWorld/pull/25
* Fix Region on Old Watchtower torch by @roseasromeo in https://github.com/roseasromeo/DeathsDoorAPWorld/pull/26
* Add start weapon yaml option by @roseasromeo in https://github.com/roseasromeo/DeathsDoorAPWorld/pull/27
* Remove bomb requirement from Estate South to North traversal by @roseasromeo in https://github.com/roseasromeo/DeathsDoorAPWorld/pull/29
* Add installation instructions to the README by @roseasromeo in https://github.com/roseasromeo/DeathsDoorAPWorld/pull/30
* Change version check for UT compatibility to be string-based by @roseasromeo in https://github.com/roseasromeo/DeathsDoorAPWorld/pull/31
* Add info page by @roseasromeo in https://github.com/roseasromeo/DeathsDoorAPWorld/pull/32

## New Contributors
* @ScipioWright made their first contribution in https://github.com/roseasromeo/DeathsDoorAPWorld/pull/1
* @roseasromeo made their first contribution in https://github.com/roseasromeo/DeathsDoorAPWorld/pull/2

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/roseasromeo/DeathsDoorAPWorld/commits/v0.1.0
v0.1.0.title: v0.1.0

v0.2.1.description:
Implement options from standalone randomizer. Additionally, fix a few minor logic issues.

Highlights:
* Many new options:
    * Two new goal options: True Ending (Tablets) and Green Tablet (Planted Life Seeds)
    * Change planted pots required for Green Ancient Tablet of Knowledge door
    * Add/remove life seeds from item pool
    * Add extra magic and vitality shards
    * Start with Souls and have a soul multiplier
    * Remove spell upgrades from the pool
    * Glitch and trick logic options
    * Exclude specific pools of checks from being randomized (ex. keep Giant Souls on Urn Witch, Frog King, and Betty by adding "Giant Soul" to the unrandomized_pools option)

## What's Changed
* Update the readme with missed sections by @roseasromeo in https://github.com/roseasromeo/DeathsDoorAPWorld/pull/34
* check the start_weapon option correctly by @roseasromeo in https://github.com/roseasromeo/DeathsDoorAPWorld/pull/35
* more credit for descriptions by @roseasromeo in https://github.com/roseasromeo/DeathsDoorAPWorld/pull/36
* Implement almost all of the options from the standalone randomizer by @roseasromeo in https://github.com/roseasromeo/DeathsDoorAPWorld/pull/41
* Fix region for flooded fortress upper watchtower lever by @roseasromeo in https://github.com/roseasromeo/DeathsDoorAPWorld/pull/42
* add night and avarice location groups by @roseasromeo in https://github.com/roseasromeo/DeathsDoorAPWorld/pull/43
* Allow player to select which pools they don't want randomized by @roseasromeo in https://github.com/roseasromeo/DeathsDoorAPWorld/pull/44
* Add spell upgrade removal option by @roseasromeo in https://github.com/roseasromeo/DeathsDoorAPWorld/pull/46
* Add soul multiplier and starting souls to the yaml by @roseasromeo in https://github.com/roseasromeo/DeathsDoorAPWorld/pull/45
* Update README.md by @roseasromeo in https://github.com/roseasromeo/DeathsDoorAPWorld/pull/47
* Some pep8 and option description stuff by @ScipioWright in https://github.com/roseasromeo/DeathsDoorAPWorld/pull/48
* Call 100 Souls item Soul Orb instead by @roseasromeo in https://github.com/roseasromeo/DeathsDoorAPWorld/pull/49
* bump world version by @roseasromeo in https://github.com/roseasromeo/DeathsDoorAPWorld/pull/50
* implement Green Tablet and True Ending goals by @roseasromeo in https://github.com/roseasromeo/DeathsDoorAPWorld/pull/51
* Fix up compatibility with Universal Tracker by @roseasromeo in https://github.com/roseasromeo/DeathsDoorAPWorld/pull/52


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/roseasromeo/DeathsDoorAPWorld/compare/v0.1.0...v0.2.1
v0.2.1.title: Death's Door Apworld v0.2.1
